snippet.title: Villains Inside – PV1
snippet.description:
Download Here!
https://gtion.itch.io/villains-inside

Villains Inside is an action game that uses agility and the ability to read situations well and take appropriate action as the key to finishing the game. This game is a game with the theme of Covid-19, where players will act like a virus that enters and attacks the body and multiplies and fights the immune system that will protect the body from attacks from outside. The story of the game itself is not about evil against good but teaches how a virus's existence affects the human body.
